results.content: Brent is an incredible instructor. He describes the drawing process in a way that is so understandable. I never tried drawing because I’m not “artsy”. He explains how drawing is a learnable skill that anyone can learn with dedicated practice. I’m going to take all his courses!
results.content_html: Brent is an incredible instructor. He describes the drawing process in a way that is so understandable. I never tried drawing because I’m not “artsy”. He explains how drawing is a learnable skill that anyone can learn with dedicated practice. I’m going to take all his courses!

results.content: Overall I found this course to be great, but the fact that the video talking about materials is in the bonus section and is not the very first video in the course is so confusing to me.
results.content_html: Overall I found this course to be great, but the fact that the video talking about materials is in the bonus section and is not the very first video in the course is so confusing to me.

results.content: Excellent instruction.  Clear directions.  Encouraging and inviting. Brent, thank you for your attention to detail and presenting such thorough demos.  I have learned a lot very quickly.
results.content_html: Excellent instruction. Clear directions. Encouraging and inviting. Brent, thank you for your attention to detail and presenting such thorough demos. I have learned a lot very quickly.

results.content: A fantastic course. The explanation are so easy to understand and follow. I have learnt and understood exactly what it takes to draw through the well explained and well demonstrated lectures.
results.content_html: A fantastic course. The explanation are so easy to understand and follow. I have learnt and understood exactly what it takes to draw through the well explained and well demonstrated lectures.

results.content: I wanted something to get me back into art, specifically by going back to basics. This course did that and made the basics interesting. Thanks Brent.
results.content_html: I wanted something to get me back into art, specifically by going back to basics. This course did that and made the basics interesting. Thanks Brent.

results.content: I loved this course. Not only the content is high quality and shows you how to learn drawing, the quality of the videos themselves is the best seen so far in online training. The only thing I miss is the sound of the pencil on the paper.
results.content_html: I loved this course. Not only the content is high quality and shows you how to learn drawing, the quality of the videos themselves is the best seen so far in online training. The only thing I miss is the sound of the pencil on the paper.

results.content: Making progress slowly; but its great to start with basic skills rather than trying to do even simple drawings.
results.content_html: Making progress slowly; but its great to start with basic skills rather than trying to do even simple drawings.

results.content: Outstanding in everyway. I find myself using the practice steps from this course everyday. Highly recommended to lay a foundation that you can build on. I have purchased all 7 of the Art & Science of Drawing and look forward to further developing my drawing skills.
results.content_html: Outstanding in everyway. I find myself using the practice steps from this course everyday. Highly recommended to lay a foundation that you can build on. I have purchased all 7 of the Art & Science of Drawing and look forward to further developing my drawing skills.

results.content: This was exactly what I was looking for! The instructions are detailed but not overwhelmingly so. The pacing is superb, I never felt bored or that it was moving too fast. I will definitely watch this course more than once.
results.content_html: This was exactly what I was looking for! The instructions are detailed but not overwhelmingly so. The pacing is superb, I never felt bored or that it was moving too fast. I will definitely watch this course more than once.

results.content: So glad I chose this course. Brent is a great teacher.  Very easy to follow and take in.  My drawing techniques have gone from 4 to 8 in a few lessons.  By the time I have finished this course I know I will have achieved my goal to 10 and will be able to draw anything I like, at last.  Thank you Brent.
results.content_html: So glad I chose this course. Brent is a great teacher. Very easy to follow and take in. My drawing techniques have gone from 4 to 8 in a few lessons. By the time I have finished this course I know I will have achieved my goal to 10 and will be able to draw anything I like, at last. Thank you Brent.

results.content: The course is amazing! I am a total beginner in drawing and this course gave me a lot of info about how to improve myself! I will definitely enroll in the rest of the courses!
results.content_html: The course is amazing! I am a total beginner in drawing and this course gave me a lot of info about how to improve myself! I will definitely enroll in the rest of the courses!

results.content: It’s really good. He is patient, clear, and concise - explaining with necessary detail but no more.
